metadata.title: CVE-2023-30944 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The vulnerability was found Moodle which exists due to insufficientsanitization of user-supplied data in external Wiki method for listingpages. A remote attacker can send a specially crafted request to theaffected application and execute limited SQL commands within theapplication database.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
